synopsis.text:
Until now, on the vast continent of Longmai, might has ruled supreme, with countless clans and sects vying for dominance in a world where cultivation is everything. The strong reign unchallenged, while the weak are left to scrape by like insignificant insects. Born with an incomplete dan region, young Chen Feng finds himself unable to cultivate and is subjected to endless ridicule. However, his life takes an unexpected turn when he stumbles upon a mysterious dragon bloodline that shatters his limitations and propels him into a new world of possibilities.

In this newfound existence, Chen Feng finds himself surrounded by a diverse array of enchanting women, from the playful demonic fox spirits to the aloof and regal female emperors, and even the bewitching demon girls and noble princesses. With an unparalleled inheritance now at his disposal, Chen Feng is poised to unleash the most formidable martial spirit, captivate the hearts of these stunning beauties, and ascend to the highest echelons of power, gazing down upon the world from the heavens above.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
